description:
A fight in the forest is on as Jin Kariya and Captain Byakuya Kuchiki meet for the first time.  A colossal amount of spiritual pressure surges through the trees when the power of these two veteran warriors collides. Kariya gloats as he effortlessly pairs his newly introduced Doll against Byakuya`s Zanpakuto but neither of these two forces is easily discouraged.  Meanwhile, Koga and Ichinose are hard at work recruiting the residents of Kusajishi to help take on the Seireitei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya Shutsujin! Kaze o Saku Sakura no Mai
Byakuya Takes the Field! Dance of the Wind-Splitting Cherry Blossoms
Byakuya dans la bataille ! La danse des fleurs de cerisiers qui déchire le vent
白哉出陣! 風を裂く桜の舞
